Dead End Strike.name: Dead End Strike
Dead End Strike.fullText:
Champion of the Labyrinth Attack 11Dead End Strike

You smite your foe with an attack and are prepared to spring if it should run.

Encounter        Weapon
Standard Action      Melee or Ranged weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Your highest ability vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + your highest ability modifier damage. In addition, if the target moves before the start of your next turn, you can shift your speed to a square adjacent to the target as an opportunity action. If you do, the target takes 5 damage and ends its movement.


Published in Dragon Magazine 385, page(s) 22.
Dead End Strike.flavor: You smite your foe with an attack and are prepared to spring if it should run.
Dead End Strike.onHit: 2[W] + your highest ability modifier damage. In addition, if the target moves before the start of your next turn, you can shift your speed to a square adjacent to the target as an opportunity action. If you do, the target takes 5 damage and ends its movement.

Labyrinth of Foes.name: Labyrinth of Foes
Labyrinth of Foes.fullText:
Champion of the Labyrinth Attack 20Labyrinth of Foes

You navigate the battlefield as you would a labyrinth, striking and dodging amid the maze of your bewildered foes.

Daily        Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Effect: You shift your speed. Each time you enter a square during this move, you can make the following attack.

  Target: One creature you have not attacked with this power this turn

  Attack: Your highest ability vs. AC

  Hit: 1[W] + your highest ability modifier damage, you slide the target 3 squares, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

  Miss: Half damage, and you slide the target 3 squares.


Published in Dragon Magazine 385, page(s) 22.
Labyrinth of Foes.flavor: You navigate the battlefield as you would a labyrinth, striking and dodging amid the maze of your bewildered foes.
Labyrinth of Foes.effect: You shift your speed. Each time you enter a square during this move, you can make the following attack.
Labyrinth of Foes.target: One creature you have not attacked with this power this turn
Labyrinth of Foes.onHit: 1[W] + your highest ability modifier damage, you slide the target 3 squares, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Labyrinth of Foes.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 3 squares.

Unwavering Vigilance.name: Unwavering Vigilance
Unwavering Vigilance.fullText:
Champion of the Labyrinth Utility 12Unwavering Vigilance

You fix your enemy fast within your gaze; no matter where it moves, it cannot escape you.

Encounter  
Minor Action  

Target: One enemy you can see

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +10 power bonus to Perception checks to detect or observe the target.


Published in Dragon Magazine 385, page(s) 22.
Unwavering Vigilance.flavor: You fix your enemy fast within your gaze; no matter where it moves, it cannot escape you.
Unwavering Vigilance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +10 power bonus to Perception checks to detect or observe the target.
